channel.title: Currently finished additional background pages to be added to the frontpage
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Currently finished additional background pages to be added to the frontpage"

item.title: Re: Currently finished additional background pages to be added to the frontpage
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Fred! Took a look at the page and its looking very nice

As for the variant ones, probably just leave them in their own little 'Variant Features' Category I think? Since I feel most of those features are decently applicable outside of their original book they were made for, unlike the hillsfar or such backgrounds which make clear reference to in story things

item.title: Re: Currently finished additional background pages to be added to the frontpage
item.content:encoded:
Added most these to the test page. Created new subcategories since a lot of those are AL specific, not sure if that makes sense?
Haven't added the variant ones yet.

item.title: Re: Currently finished additional background pages to be added to the frontpage
Currently finished additional background pages to be added to the frontpage
item.content:encoded:
Here is a list of the background pages that I have completed so far,

Curse of Strahd: Optional Backgrounds
- Black Fist Double Agent
- Dragon Casualty
- Iron Route Bandit
- Phlan Insurgent
- Stojanow Prisoner
- Ticklebelly Nomad

Ghosts of Saltmarsh
- Fisher
- Shipwright
- Smuggler

Mulmaster Bonds and Backgrounds
- Caravan Specialist
- Earthspur Miner
- Harborfolk
- Mulmaster Aristocrat
- Phlan Refugee

Mythic Odysseys of Theros
- Athlete

State of Hillsfar
- Cormanthor Refugee
- Gate Urchin
- Hillsfar Merchant
- Hillsfar Smuggler

Background Variant Features
horde of the Dragon Queen
- Cult of the Dragon Infiltrator
- Dragon Scholar

Out of the Abyss
- Deep Delver
- Underdark Experience

There are still a few that require completion, those being a few from hilsfar and the aquisitions inc backgrounds, specifically:

State of Hillsfar
- Secret Identity
- Shade Fanatic
- Trade Sheriff

Acquisitions Inc
- Celebrity Adventurer's Scion
- Failed Merchant
- Gambler
- Plaintiff
- Rival Intern

The finished pages should be added to the frontpage, and the yet to be completed pages I will continue working on so they can be added there eventually
